name: childright

address: Project Prakruti Sambhara, VIM - 435, West portion of Ground Floor

briefDescription: childright is a Rights Based child focused grassroots organisation (we ensure the scope of children's participation in all our programs/activities & the children benefited out of it) believes in this philosophy that if parents (especially Mother) are economically empowered and their livelihoods are protected, they can end Child Poverty, better nurture and ensure Rights of their Children to grow with dignity. To make this a reality, we focus on Rights of Child & Sustainable Livelihoods / Food Security through Integrated Natural Farming and Micro Enterprises to reduce Poverty & Hunger. We also work on Women & childrenâ€™s Health & Education; well-being and Empowerment; Promotion of Social Entrepreneurship to advocate for their Rights
